name: Zyla Health
description: India’s leading AI-based healthcare management platform that offers high quality, personalized, and real-time 24*7 care. Zyla is on a mission to personalise care to every individual & is leading this paradigm shift in the healthcare industry based on assessing the risk profile, recommending the health interventions, and delivering it by a world-class team of in-house Doctors and healthcare professionals backed by data-driven and empathetic technology. To the world, we are the personal healthcare expert for millions of families in India and around the world, that are always by their side.
features: High-impact, high-quality work, work on building the core products from day one
Fully remote team, work from anywhere
Solve the broken health care management with the potential of impacting millions of lives
Headline: Building a healthier tomorrow
ShortDescription: Zyla is the personal healthcare expert for millions of families in India and around the world.

Highlights.name: Zyla for Insurance
Highlights.description: Care management to reduce claim costs

Highlights.name: Zyla for Corporates
Highlights.description: Employee wellness for a health-focused workplace

Highlights.name: Zyla for Pharma
Highlights.description: Patient support programs for improved therapy outcomes

enhanced_description: Zyla Health is an AI-based healthcare management platform that provides high-quality, personalized, and real-time 24/7 care. It leverages a data-driven and empathetic technology approach, supported by in-house doctors and healthcare professionals, to assess individual risk profiles, recommend health interventions, and deliver comprehensive care. Positioned as a personal healthcare expert for millions of families globally, Zyla also offers specialized solutions for enterprises, including care management for insurance companies to reduce claim costs, employee wellness programs for corporates to foster a health-focused workplace, and patient support programs for pharmaceutical companies to improve therapy outcomes.
key_use_cases: Individual risk profile assessment for health
Delivery of care by medical professionals
Care management for insurance companies to reduce claim costs
Employee wellness program implementation for corporates
Patient support programs for pharmaceutical companies
competitive_advantages: India's leading AI-based healthcare management platform
World-class team of in-house Doctors and healthcare professionals
Backed by data-driven and empathetic technology
Comprehensive care model covering risk assessment, intervention, and delivery
Specialized offerings for insurance, corporate, and pharma sectors
roi_benefits: Reduced claim costs for insurance companies
Improved therapy outcomes for pharmaceutical patients
